rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript Validation For DME before Uplanned Change Closure
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation For DME before Uplanned Change Closure
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var dmeRec = new SCFile(\"dataModEvent\");\u000aif(dmeRec.doSelect(\"linkedTableName=\\\"cm3r\\\" and linkedRecordId=\\\"\"+vars.$L_file.number+\"\\\" and active=true and status isin {\\\"implemented\\\",\\\"failedValidation\\\",\\\"planned\\\",\\\"proposed\\\"}\")==RC_SUCCESS)\u000a{\u000a returnCode=1;\u000a message=system.functions.scmsg(530, \"cm3\");\u000a}\u000aelse\u000a{\u000a returnCode=0;\u000a}"}
